rules.name: Dangerous Terrain
rules.description: Models moving across dangerous terrain, or that activate in it, must roll one die (or as many as their tough value), and for each roll of 1 the unit takes a wound.

rules.name: Underdog Point
rules.description: Each underdog point can be spent to modify all dice in a friendly or enemy roll by +1 or -1, but only one point can be spent per roll.
